title: (BONUS EP) Adoptions Gone Awry
description: In this month's bonus episode, the gals navigate some tricky legal and moral ground when it comes to raising non-biological children. Topics include a train full of orphans, a particularly heartbreaking missing persons case, and one very bizarre story of age ambiguity. Pour some of Winc's Cherries & Rainbows Red down your gullet, double-check your birth certificate, and tune in for Adoptions Gone Awry.
